thread.title: Who is this Ranbir Kapoor's doppelganger? - Entertainment
thread.title_full: Who is this Ranbir Kapoor's doppelganger? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Who is this Ranbir Kapoor's doppelganger? - Entertainment
text:
We spotted Govinda's son Yashvardhan Ahuja in Juhu the other day and could not help, but notice the striking similarity to Ranbir Kapoor. The star son is an actor-in-waiting.

There have been comparisons about the two in the past, but now Yashvardhan looks exactly like RK's junior version. Perhaps some filmmaker will cast the youngster as his brother in a film. And to think Govinda was supposed to play Ranbir Kapoor's father in in Anurag Basu's Jagga Jasoos.
